feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: RedDeer RCP feature provides capabilities similar to Eclipse RCP feature. There are included RedDeer SWT, Workbench, JFace and UIForms plugins plus plugins required to have properly running RedDeer tests such as RedDeer JUnit, Common and Direct plugins.
feature.copyright: JBoss, Home of Professional Open Source Copyright (c) Red Hat, Inc., and individual contributors as indicated by the @authors tag, 2012-2013. See the copyright.txt in the distribution for a full listing of individual contributors.
